Comments_List: I developed my knowledge of Latin grammar and syntax.

This course is generally good. It is focused on the practical application of translating into latin. I have no particular suggestions for improvement, as the rhythm of the class is already adapted to this goal.
Yes. Anyone who wants to improve latin skills needs to practice them.
